Title: The Monk
Writer: Matthew Lewis (novel), Dominik Moll (screenplay), Anne-Louise Trividic (screenplay)
Actors: Vincent Cassel, Déborah François, Joséphine Japy, Sergi López
Plot: Madrid, in the seventeenth century. Abandoned at the doorstep of a monastery, Ambrosio has been brought up by the Capucin Friars. After becoming a friar himself, he becomes an unrivaled ...
